message: Event organizers said survivor insight can give a powerful look at the true issues at hand. Shedding light on human trafficking is something those involved in the conference said doesn’t happen enough.

data.description: The Human Trafficking Prevention and Awareness Conference on Saturday, April 21 brought survivors in Amarillo together to share their personal testimonies and spread awareness.I was trafficked on the streets of New York. I grew up being trafficked from the
data.title: Human trafficking survivors hope to raise awareness
